p: Twenty grams of the sample of S. canadensis was ground in a blender and then hydrodistilled in a Clevenger-type apparatus for 2 h. The oils were solubilized in n-hexane and stored under N 2 at +4 Â°C in dark until analysis. The oil yield of the plant materials was a colorless-yellow oil. Pure EO for analysis by GC-MS was diluted to 1:1000 ratios in n-hexane. Analyses were replicated three times.
